messages.title: The issues in this Election
messages.content: The issues in this Election are far greater than those Theresa May gambled on when she called it. She has badly misjudged the country's mood, our concerns and our aspirations for the future.

messages.title: Under Theresa May
messages.content: Under Theresa May you will get more of the same. Under Labour you will get positive change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: To stop the Tories winning again here in Warrington South every Labour supporter has to vote in this vital General Election. Previous elections show that only Labour or the Tories win.

issues.brexitEurope: We cannot risk crashing out of Europe with the Hobson’s choice of a bad Tory deal or no deal.
issues.governance: Under Theresa May you will get more of the same. Under Labour you will get positive change.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am genuinely inclusive in my approach to politics, with clear credentials and a proven track record of fighting for the people of Warrington.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Warrington Borough Council and was privileged to serve as Mayor of Warrington 2016-17

contactInformation.address: Suite 97, 95 Dewhurst Road, Birchwood Warrington WA3 7PG
